pages.text: $(thing)Rage$() is a natural resource governing the body's naturally building agitation.$(br)As you take damage from entities, it will build within your body, growing until it reaches its limit.$(br2)$(thing)Rage$() drains naturally over time, eventually resetting to zero.
pages.title: Rage

pages.text: $(l:aoa3:vulcanes#vulcanes)Vulcanes$(/l) draw from the body's $(thing)rage$() to power themselves.
Visit the official $(aoa) wiki page for more information.
pages.title: AoA Wiki
